entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
